description: This is a FastAPI route module for managing explanations and topics in an educational or content-generation backend. It provides API endpoints to create explanations, fetch topics with explanations, list topic history, and regenerate explanations, integrating with a database via SQLAlchemy models and schemas.

methods.name: LevelEnum _level_to_enum(level: Level)
methods.description: Converts a Level object to a LevelEnum for database storage.

methods.name: create_explanations(payload: ExplanationRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to create a topic and generate explanations at specified levels.

methods.name: get_topic(topic_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API endpoint to fetch a specific topic with all related explanations.

methods.name: get_history( limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Max items to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of items to skip"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: API endpoint to list topics with a count of explanations for each.

methods.name: regenerate_explanation( topic_id: int, level: Level = Query(..., description="Level to regenerate"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: API endpoint to regenerate an explanation for a topic at a specified level and store it.
